Reviews.Title: “Fine for a couple of nights - but no more...”
Reviews.Author: jgreen78
Reviews.Content: lift antiquated takes 3 people doors closed floor pity guests fulfilled requirement close baker street tube walked kings cross 45mins hour clean shame noise heater extractor fan throughout night

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointing”
Reviews.Author: lyndon1965
Reviews.Content: plus free tea coffee times facilities location short walk baker street tube station free wifi bad carpet disgraceful dirty badly stained paintwork cleanliness throughout hotel dirty looked shabby breakfast joke extremely limited selection fresh limited cold meat eggs bad lift third floor 4th accomodate 2 people maximum didnt people left door unable call lift shower ran hot cold moment boiling hot freezing dirty glasses cups changed day cleaned feel hotel worth price

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: persejonh
Reviews.Content: arrive hotel trouble receptionist booking canceled didnt receptionist cant reservation letter travel agent cancellation late thanks staff morning fine booking receptionist settled staff hotel friendly location 5 min baker street tube 10 min madam tussauds museum else clean special breakfast poor

Reviews.Title: “OK Place to Spend One Night, But Not More”
Reviews.Author: rtr2008
Reviews.Content: americana hotel offers reasonably priced hotel london wont fanciest youve stayed relatively inexpensive clean single consisted standard bed firmer fine bathroom shower reviewers noted carpet worn especially hallways spotless terms amenities americana offers free wifi thats fast reliable access wifi hotel lobby serve modest sufficient continental breakfast offer free coffee hot chocolate throughout day unexpectedly nice touches price americana located block london business school regents park five minute walk baker street tube station youll plenty shops restaurants

Reviews.Title: “For London this hotel was fine”
Reviews.Author: ashni
Reviews.Content: hotel location 7 8 min walk form baker street station set quiet street mins walk shops restaurants lords cricket stadium close saying location hotels saving grace stayed 3 nights birthday treat mum basic clean werent planning spending deal time fine tea coffee facilities whilst drinks machine lobby regularly broke breakfast waste time stuff gone 0800 replenished including bread available wasnt appetising staff fine chatty breakfast woman abrupt sharp balanced friendly night porter stairs narrow lift lift noisy held person suitcase london hotel adequate didnt experience unbearable started stay style accommodation london bit extra space ultimately comes similar prices 3 star hotels

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Stay.”
Reviews.Author: Boycebabe
Reviews.Content: worse stayed booked theatre break daughter treat totally exhausted hotel shabby tiny twin double didnt matter couldnt sleep noise traffic hot twin night window dangerous closed double squeeze past hand basin shower bedroom tiny beds clean staff pleasant helpful wifi free breakfast ok hotel overpriced buget hotel children avoid danger falling window travelled overnight bags laptop bag lift luggage sum noisy dirty overpriced uncomfortable

Reviews.Title: “a nightmare”
Reviews.Author: carina77
Reviews.Content: worst hotel weve stayed dirtiest shabbiest weve arrived night flight hour check time told rudest manner ready couple hours call nightmare extremely dirty broken door window excuse breakfast buffee staff rude willing help simple information timetable bus stopping front hotel unheard location fantastic underground web london stay little center town accomodation americana hotel spoiled time visit london beware

Reviews.Title: “Does the job for an overnight business stay.”
Reviews.Author: peteandjonny Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: whilst choose stay leisure fine overnight business stay tight budget hotel location baker street marylebone tube stations appointed tv shower comfy bed decor standard whilst carpets seen days clean continental breakfast included teacoffee facilities

Reviews.Title: “A hidden gem for short weekend trips and couples, 100% recommended!”
Reviews.Author: decph
Reviews.Content: winner easy airport baker st hotel 400m corner tube station short walk station quickly realized location passing cafes restaurants 24hour tesco express actual hotel comfortable modern perfect couple bed tv table bathroom complimentary breakfast delicious fro continental breakfast included hard soft boiled eggs finally £10 taxi usual shopping tourist spots seriously recommended

Reviews.Title: “Location ok, but the cleanliness poor in rooms, need refurb desperately”
Reviews.Author: LeollB
Reviews.Content: staff friendly helpful breakfast ok hallways hotel cleaning thoroughly pull start travelled uk europe hotel dirty dont refurbish

Reviews.Title: “Good value & location, pretty bad service”
Reviews.Author: Berglind
Reviews.Content: stayed americana hotel 4 nights january arrived pretty late girls 1718 reception chatting laughing loudly didnt bother didnt look act professional eg breakfast times time figure supermarket staff met nice helpful unfortunately girls lot shifts stayed top floor meant tiny elevator 3rd 4th floor walk rest bags tiny clean reasonable price location 5 min walk baker street tube station breakfast basic white bread yogurts budget london hotel reasonable

Reviews.Title: “Great value, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Jackie_H_10
Reviews.Content: stayed night found americana excellent value pleasant building reception dinning shown wasnt staff helpful pleasant requested breakfast hotel situated lovely quiet

Reviews.Title: “Okay for a short trip”
Reviews.Author: HawkMD
Reviews.Content: stayed americana jan 2009 4 day getaway hotel served warm bed underground breakfast okay hotel busy staff served purpose bit disinterested time hotel adequate served

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: bhusawal
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel location hotel recommended dirty carpet cleaned months bathroom shower stall 2 feet 2 feet uncomfortable lobby ok breakfast reasonable citys garbage cleaners breakfast everyday staff helpful limited experience expertise bottom line recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Deal”
Reviews.Author: shewchuk316
Reviews.Content: booked hotel minute little apprehensive reviews hotel location near tube station clean main floor decorated nicely continental breakfast served cereal yogurt eggs croissants toast coffee juice carpet halls replacing worn dirty looking vacuumed everyday clean hotel sleep location hotel perfect

Reviews.Title: “Needs refurbishment”
Reviews.Author: rmaustrav
Reviews.Content: husband arrived upgrade couldnt suitcases standard double paid extra upgraded twin dirty carpet smell bathroom okay refurbished average standard breakfast lounge recently refurbed proceeding accommodation levels shabby

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN!!!!”

Reviews.Content: stay hotel suppose stay week stayed 3 days hot water cause bump ok happen didnt care 2 days hot water saying fix 2 days couldnt manager tried 2 hours via internet hotel didnt help half money paid elevator poor breakfast

Reviews.Title: “A Good Budget Hotel in London”
Reviews.Author: fr21555
Reviews.Content: americana convenient underground close baker street choice spending time central london require basic accomodations bathrooms upside price lot worse central london quiet faced alleyway street hotel view sleep couple nights filled bill pretty reasonable price theres breakfast buffet morning coffeetea maker available free wifi cost ridiculous

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and value for money if on shopping trip”
Reviews.Author: M-P7
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel december daughter business shopping christmas hotel basic perfect doing shopping keeping expenses situated five minutes walk baker street station staff friendly hotel lovely warm weather cold outside adequate dire updating carpet stained beds spotless bathroom spotless clean towels issued day price included breakfast found excellent eaters morning getting eat thrown price bonus eat wouldnt hungry starting day visiting short time value money hotel looking lavishness stay pay huge prices clean warm friendly value hotel doing retail therapy definitely return
